body.name: AM alphamount TV Wall Mount Bracket Full Motion for Most 13-39 inch TVs Monitors with 360° Rotation Articulating Swivel Extension Arms and Tilt, Hold TV up to 44lbs Max VESA 200x200mm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 37 mins
features: 360° ROTATION TV WALL MOUNT: Choose between portrait and landscape orientation thanks to the 360° screen rotation. The TV mount with articulating arm design provides a low profile of 2.13” when collapsed and extends out up to 14.6” for viewing.

WIDE COMPATIBILITY: This full motion TV mount fits most 13”-39” TVs up to 44lbs with VESA mounting patterns 75x75mm-200x200mm. Please verify the VESA pattern, size, and weight of your TV before purchase.

FULL MOTION ADJUSTMENT: Features +5/-15° tilt and 180° swivel for a wide range of flexibility, this TV wall mount is a great solution for rooms with multiple viewing areas or as a corner mount to save space.

STRONG & STURDY: The universal TV wall mount is made of heavy-duty steel materials and designed to securely hold your TV. Use TV mount to Hang your TV on wall can be a safer option for kids and pets while giving your home a cleaner look.

EASY TO INSTALL: Instruction manual and mounting hardware is included for the easy installation. This mount can be installed on a single wood stud, concrete, or brick wall. Please verify your wall type before purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hang your TV on wall, Make your room a place of Peace and Happiness Universal TV wall mount APSF3 is made of heavy-duty steel materials and designed to securely hold your TV on wall.

Why should you choose this Full Motion Articulating TV wall mount? Safety. Hang TV on the wall is a good way to reduce the chances of any injury caused by a TV tipping over. Our full motion Single stud TV mount with strong articulating arms was built in high qualified steels, it can strongly keep your TV safe on the wall to prevent your TV from accidental bumping.Space-Saving. TV wall mount will save you valuable space by hanging TV on the wall. Without a TV wall mount, you may need a TV stand or other furniture to support you TV, this articulating TV wall mount with extension feature is not only able to retract 2.13 inch/extend out to 14.6 inch for your comfortable viewing experience, but also improve the layout of your room.Eliminate screen glare & eyes fatigue. +5°/-15° tilting feature will reduce or completely eliminate the screen glaring, you can adjust the tilting angle to fit your viewing position.Flexibility adjustment. With +90°/-90° Swivel, ±3º leveling after installation and 2.13-14.6 inch extension arm, this TV wall mount is flexible to fit most position for your room for viewing, every seat can be the best seat in the room.Single-Stud design. Thanks to the single stud design, you can put this mount almost anywhere on the wall. No enough wall space on your home or office to mount a TV? Have to sacrifice your decoration and layout to settle you TV? Just mounting your TV in a corner to opens up a world of possibilities and flexibility. This tv mount is a perfect solution If you need to put you TV in a corner.Easy Installation. Single stud full-Motion TV Mount Bracket allows you to drill only once/find ONE stud instead of TWO to mount your TV on wall. With necessary hardware and vivid user manual, installation can be finished in about 15 minutes. Good quality hardware and assembly parts allows to install TV mount on concrete/brick walls, and wood stud walls, Make sure you WON'T install it on dry wall alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the AM alphamount TV Wall Mount Bracket for my 32-inch TV, and I am extremely satisfied with this product. This wall mount bracket offers exceptional value, versatility, and functionality for smaller-sized TVs and monitors ranging from 13 to 39 inches.One of the standout features of this wall mount is its full-motion capability. The 360° rotation and swivel, along with the tilt and articulation, provide an incredible range of motion. This means I can easily adjust the viewing angle of my TV to suit any situation. Whether I want to watch TV from different spots in the room or need to eliminate glare, this wall mount has me covered.Installation was surprisingly straightforward. The included instructions were clear and easy to follow, and all the necessary hardware was provided. I was able to mount my TV securely to the wall in no time, thanks to the thoughtful design and user-friendly installation process.The build quality of the AM alphamount TV Wall Mount Bracket is impressive. It feels robust and well-constructed, giving me confidence that my TV is safely and securely mounted. The bracket's slim profile also ensures that it sits close to the wall, providing a neat and tidy look to my entertainment area.This wall mount bracket is versatile and compatible with a wide range of VESA patterns, making it suitable for various TV and monitor models. It even includes a built-in cable management system that helps keep cables organized and out of sight for a clean and clutter-free appearance.In summary, the AM alphamount TV Wall Mount Bracket is a fantastic choice for anyone with a smaller-sized TV or monitor. Its full-motion capabilities, easy installation, sturdy build quality, and compatibility with different VESA patterns make it a top-notch option. Whether you're looking to save space, enhance your viewing experience, or achieve a sleek, modern look in your living space, this wall mount bracket has you covered. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and versatile TV wall mount solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and adjust!
reviews.reviewText: I installed this myself in about 20 minutes after finding a stud to drill into. It’s sturdy and easy enough to mount a tv on. You can tilt and adjust the tv to your liking.Make sure you get a tv with a low profile because this will make it look bulkier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it say
reviews.reviewText: It does exactly what it says it does. Simple to assemble and mount no complaints. Really don’t know how else to say it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Install & Heavy Duty
reviews.reviewText: I bought this TV Bracket to hang my daughters TV in her room. My decision to buy was based on Price and next day delivery. Package arrived next day as advertised on screen. I opened package and noticed right away this is a good heavy duty bracket. Brakes is made of all metal. It was easy to install once I located the stud. The best part about this bracket is that you can swing it out. My daughter was very happy with her TV mounted on the wall. Over all a great product at great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great and is very sturdy. Simple to set up worked great for my 32" tv

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a 24" samsung smart tv hung on this and it works great! Rotates and pivots well!
